## **Professional Experience Record**

### **CAP – AMS**  
- **Year**: 01/2021 – Present  
- **Location**: Germany  
- **Client**: Various Federal Authorities (e.g., Federal Ministry of Agriculture)  
- **Position**: Geospatial Developer  
- **Description**:  
  Development of remote sensing-based monitoring tools for agricultural parcel monitoring using Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2, and Planet Fusion imagery.

### **HICAM**  
- **Year**: 01/2020 – 12/2021  
- **Location**: Germany  
- **Client**: Helmholz Centre for Environmental Research  
- **Position**: Scientific Researcher  
- **Description**:  
  Developing classification workflows for climate change impact analysis on agricultural and aquatic ecosystems, using Sentinel-1/2 time series.

### **High Resolution Layers (Grassland and Forest)**  
- **Year**: 2018  
- **Location**: Germany  
- **Client**: European Commission  
- **Position**: Geospatial Analyst  
- **Description**:  
  Creation of High-Resolution Raster Layers to classify grassland and forest areas across the European Union.

### **Pure Forest**  
- **Year**: 09/2011 – 09/2013  
- **Location**: Republic of Panama  
- **Client**: Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation, Building and Nuclear Safety  
- **Position**: Forest and Environmental Engineer  
- **Description**:  
  Forest inventory, coordination of timber harvesting and reforestation projects with Acacia mangium as part of a certified forest management initiative.

---

## **Publications**

- **Asam S, Gessner U, Almengor González R, Wenzl M, Kriese J, Kuenzer C.**  
  Mapping Crop Types of Germany by Combining Temporal Statistical Metrics of Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 Time Series with LPIS Data.  
  *Remote Sensing*, 2022; 14(13):2981.  
  [https://doi.org/10.3390/rs14132981](https://doi.org/10.3390/rs14132981)
